questions.question: What is the primary color of the pendant displayed on the necklace?
What is the dominant shape of the pendant's central design element?
What appears to be the material of the necklace chain?
What kind of clasp is visible at the end of the necklace?
Considering the pendant's embellishments, what seems to be their texture?
What is the overall length of the necklace, from end to end?
How many petals or leaves compose the central design of the pendant?
Does the necklace exhibit a matte or shiny finish?
What is the apparent style of the necklace and pendant; what is its design language?
Considering the pendant's size relative to the model, is it large or small?
Is the necklace designed for a formal or casual occasion?
What is the style of the necklace's chain links?
What is the apparent thickness of the necklace chain?
What is the overall color of the necklace chain and pendant?
Does the pendant display any additional markings apart from the design itself?
